Package io.github.agroportal.ncboproxy.parameters

Interface ParameterHandlerRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
NCBOProxyParameterHandlerRegistry

  • Method Details

    • registerParameterHandler

      ParameterHandlerRegistry registerParameterHandler(String name, ParameterHandler parameterHandler, boolean isOptional)
      Register a parameter handler for a given parameter name, that may be optional or mandatory
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter (i.e. name as in ?name=value)
      parameterHandler - The parameter handler to register
      isOptional - Whether the parameter is mandatory or not. A mandatory parameter must be matched, if it is absent an exception is thrown during parameter processing. A Servlet handler will mark parameters that are re quired to trigger that handler as mandatory
      Returns:
      Returns self (functional style interface)

    • registerParameterHandler

      ParameterHandlerRegistry registerParameterHandler(String name, ParameterHandler parameterHandler, boolean isOptional, String... constrainedValues)
      Register a parameter handler for a given parameter name, that may be optional or mandatory
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter (i.e. name as in ?name=value)
      parameterHandler - The parameter handler to register
      constrainedValues - a list of constrained values that must be matched for the handler to be triggered
      isOptional - Whether the parameter is mandatory or not. A mandatory parameter must be matched, if it is absent an exception is thrown during parameter processing. A Servlet handler will mark parameters that are re quired to trigger that handler as mandatory
      Returns:
      Returns self (functional style interface)

    • processParameters

      Map<String,String> processParameters(Map<String,List<String>> queryParameters, Map<String,String> queryHeaders, String queryPath, ServletHandler servletHandler) throws InvalidParameterException
      Process parameters and trigger matching parameter handlers
      Parameters:
      queryParameters - The map of query parameters
      queryHeaders - The map of query headers
      queryPath - The query path
      servletHandler - The servlet handler processing the request
      Returns:
      A map of output parameters that can optionally be generated by some parameter handler to communicate values to the servlet handler and to the output generator
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - Thrown if an invalid value for a parameter is specified as specified in any of the parameter handlers, it's the responsibility of the handlers to generate informative error messages

    • polymorphicOverride

      ParameterHandlerRegistry polymorphicOverride(ParameterHandlerRegistry otherParameterHandlerRegistry)
      Override existing parameter handlers registered in otherParameterHandlerRegistry
      Parameters:
      otherParameterHandlerRegistry - Another parameter handler registry
      Returns:
      Returns self (functional style interface)

    • create

      static ParameterHandlerRegistry create()
      Creates an instance of the default ParameterHandlerRegistry implementation, currently NCBOProxyParameterHandlerRegistry
      Returns:
      an instance of the default ParameterHandlerRegistry implementation

    • areMandatoryConstraintsSatisfied

      boolean areMandatoryConstraintsSatisfied(Map<String,List<String>> queryParameters)
      Determines if all mandatory parameter handlers are present in the query parameters
      Parameters:
      queryParameters - The query parameters
      Returns:
      true if all mandatory parameters are present, false otherwise
